title: Replace company logo and favicon with new design

requirements.text: Replace the current company logo in the Header component with the user-provided logo image (mii.png) featuring the shield design with tow truck, American flag 'ETHOS' text, and 'TOWING SERVICES' subtitle
acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the new logo from mii.png
The logo maintains proper dimensions and aspect ratio
The logo is visible and properly styled within the header layout

requirements.text: Replace the company logo in the Footer component with the user-provided logo image (mii.png)
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component displays the new logo from mii.png
The logo is properly sized and positioned within the footer layout
The logo maintains visual consistency with the header logo

requirements.text: Update the website favicon in frontend/index.html to use the new company logo from mii.png
acceptanceCriteria: The favicon displays the new logo design in the browser tab
The favicon is properly sized (32x32 or appropriate dimensions)
The favicon is visible across all major browsers

requirements.text: Ensure the new logo image has a transparent background, removing any white or solid color backgrounds around the shield design
acceptanceCriteria: The logo displays with full transparency around all edges
No visible background artifacts or white boxes appear around the logo
The logo integrates seamlessly with the header and footer backgrounds

constraints: Maintain existing logo positioning and layout structure in Header and Footer components
Preserve responsive behavior of logo elements across all screen sizes
Do not modify the single-actor backend architecture
nonGoals: Redesigning the header or footer layouts
Changing logo dimensions or aspect ratios beyond what's necessary for proper display
Modifying other branding elements or color schemes

required: Company logo with shield design, tow truck illustration, American flag-styled 'ETHOS' text, and 'TOWING SERVICES' subtitle with transparent background for use in header and footer (ethos-logo-new.dim_400x400.png)
edits: Remove white background and ensure full transparency around shield edges (mii.png > ethos-logo-transparent.dim_400x400.png)
